alert.note: Alert for Cobb; Douglas; North Fulton; Paulding; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:39PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Paulding, southern Cobb, Douglas and south central Fulton Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 439 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Brownsville, or near Douglasville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Douglasville, City of South Fulton, Smyrna, Villa Rica, Powder Springs, Austell, Hiram, Lithia Springs, Fair Oaks, Sweetwater Creek State Park, Vinings, Brownsville, Jim R Miller Park, Chapel Hill, Six Flags Over Georgia, Winston, Bolton, New Georgia and Sandtown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Cobb; Douglas; North Fulton; Paulding; South Fulton
